identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Celestial Symposium' - a digital arena where history's greatest minds debate. Fusion of 'Theatrical Stage' + 'Modern Chat' + 'RPG Character Sheet'.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Theater Scripts with Discord Chat.
Emotion First: Intellectual awe and curiosity.
Content is King: The conversation is the hero; UI is the stage.
Zoom In: Focus on the persona's 'Turn' - make it feel like a performance.

usage.headings: Playfair Display, font-bold, tracking-tight. Use for Persona Names and Mode Titles.
usage.body: Manrope, font-normal, leading-relaxed. Use for chat content and UI labels.
usage.ui_elements: Manrope, font-medium, tracking-wide, uppercase. Use for buttons and tabs.
usage.code: JetBrains Mono. Use for system logs or 'thought process' reveals.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

arena_view.name: The Theater Stage
arena_view.description: A central transcript area flanked or bottom-lined by 'Persona Cards'. The user is the Director.
arena_view.grid: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-6 h-screen p-4 lg:p-8 overflow-hidden

areas.stage: col-span-1 lg:col-span-9 flex flex-col h-full relative z-10
areas.controls: col-span-1 lg:col-span-3 flex flex-col gap-4 h-full z-20 glass-panel

persona_manager.name: The Hall of Records
persona_manager.description: A grid of cards, each representing a soul/mind. High visual impact.
persona_manager.grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6 p-8

PersonaCard.description: Represents an active AI agent. Shows avatar, name, and 'thinking' state.
PersonaCard.style: relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-card/50 hover:bg-card/80 transition-all duration-300 group
PersonaCard.interaction: Scale up slightly on active turn. Glow border when speaking.

TranscriptBubble.description: A single turn in the conversation. NOT a standard chat bubble. More like a script block.
TranscriptBubble.style: flex flex-col gap-2 p-6 rounded-2xl bg-white/5 border border-white/5 hover:border-white/10 transition-colors
TranscriptBubble.layout: Avatar left, Name top, Text body. Markdown supported.

ModeSelector.style: flex gap-2 p-1 bg-black/40 rounded-full border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-md
ModeSelector.item: px-4 py-2 rounded-full text-sm font-medium transition-all data-[state=active]:bg-white data-[state=active]:text-black data-[state=active]:shadow-lg

philosopher.description: Greek Statue Head - Use for Socrates/Plato types
Golden Buddha Statue - Use for Eastern Philosophy

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `yarn add framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot class-variance-authority`.
2. Setup the 'Celestial' theme in `tailwind.config.js` using the colors provided.
3. Create a `Layout` component that includes the Noise Texture overlay.
5. Implement the 'Arena' view using the Grid strategy.
6. Use the provided Image URLs for the default personas. If a specific historical figure is missing, use the 'Abstract' or 'Statue' fallback.
